items.title: ESLint
items.author: Dirk Baeumer
items.description: With this plugin I make sure that the code formats according to the `.eslint` file inside the project I am working at on save. That way my code is always formatted according to the ruleset that has been decided at an earlier stage.

items.title: React Hooks Snippets
items.description: I use a lot of custom snippets, but for most hooks this plugin works really well.
items.author: Al Duncanson

items.title: Settings Sync
items.description: To keep my editors synced and so I don't need to keep track of every plugin I install I sync them using Settings Sync.
items.author: Shan Khan

items.title: Cobalt2 Theme Official
items.description: My brain seems to love the color palette used in that theme.
items.author: Wes Bos

author: Daren Malfait
title: 4 VSCode plugins I use for day-to-day javascript programming
introduction: My preferred editor at the moment is VSCode. I have set it up so it matches my way of programming so much that I would be lost to a certain point without it. A part of that setup are plugins.
description: A curated list of plugins I could not live without.
